trans-unit.source: This document provides an example of using Azure PowerShell in the Azure Resource Group mode to run Hive queries in a Hadoop on HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: This document provides an example of using Azure PowerShell in the Azure Resource Group mode to run Hive queries in a Hadoop on HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: Run Hive queries using Azure PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Run Hive queries using Azure PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Azure PowerShell provides *cmdlets* that allow you to remotely run Hive queries on HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: Azure PowerShell provides *cmdlets* that allow you to remotely run Hive queries on HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Internally, this is accomplished by using REST calls to [WebHCat](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/WebHCat) (formerly called Templeton) running on the HDInsight cluster.
trans-unit.target: Internally, this is accomplished by using REST calls to [WebHCat](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/WebHCat) (formerly called Templeton) running on the HDInsight cluster.

trans-unit.source: The following cmdlets are used when running Hive queries in a remote HDInsight cluster:
trans-unit.target: The following cmdlets are used when running Hive queries in a remote HDInsight cluster:

trans-unit.source: **Add-AzureRmAccount**: Authenticates Azure PowerShell to your Azure subscription
trans-unit.target: **Add-AzureRmAccount**: Authenticates Azure PowerShell to your Azure subscription

trans-unit.source: **New-AzureRmHDInsightHiveJobDefinition**: Creates a new *job definition* by using the specified HiveQL statements
trans-unit.target: **New-AzureRmHDInsightHiveJobDefinition**: Creates a new *job definition* by using the specified HiveQL statements

trans-unit.source: **Start-AzureRmHDInsightJob**: Sends the job definition to HDInsight, starts the job, and returns a *job* object that can be used to check the status of the job
trans-unit.target: **Start-AzureRmHDInsightJob**: Sends the job definition to HDInsight, starts the job, and returns a *job* object that can be used to check the status of the job

trans-unit.source: **Wait-AzureRmHDInsightJob**: Uses the job object to check the status of the job.
trans-unit.target: **Wait-AzureRmHDInsightJob**: Uses the job object to check the status of the job.

trans-unit.source: It will wait until the job completes or the wait time is exceeded.
trans-unit.target: It will wait until the job completes or the wait time is exceeded.

trans-unit.source: **Get-AzureRmHDInsightJobOutput**: Used to retrieve the output of the job
trans-unit.target: **Get-AzureRmHDInsightJobOutput**: Used to retrieve the output of the job

trans-unit.source: **Invoke-AzureRmHDInsightHiveJob**: Used to run HiveQL statements.
trans-unit.target: **Invoke-AzureRmHDInsightHiveJob**: Used to run HiveQL statements.

trans-unit.source: This will block the query completes, then returns the results
trans-unit.target: This will block the query completes, then returns the results

trans-unit.source: **Use-AzureRmHDInsightCluster**: Sets the current cluster to use for the **Invoke-AzureRmHDInsightHiveJob** command
trans-unit.target: **Use-AzureRmHDInsightCluster**: Sets the current cluster to use for the **Invoke-AzureRmHDInsightHiveJob** command
